testcase.name: SSOT Public Routes > GET /api/ssot/plans > should return valid plan IDs, trial config, limits, and capabilities
SSOT Public Routes > GET /api/ssot/plans > should be accessible without authentication
SSOT Public Routes > GET /api/ssot/limits > should return plan limits
SSOT Public Routes > GET /api/ssot/features > should return valid feature flags and semantics
SSOT Public Routes > GET /api/ssot/features > should include all required feature flags from SSOT
SSOT Public Routes > GET /api/ssot/tones > should return valid roast tones
SSOT Public Routes > GET /api/ssot/subscription-states > should return valid subscription states
SSOT Public Routes > GET /api/ssot/platforms > should return supported and planned platforms
SSOT Public Routes > GET /api/ssot/all > should return all SSOT data in a single response
SSOT Public Routes > GET /api/ssot/all > should include all required sections
SSOT Public Routes > Error handling > should return 500 on service errors
